TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Ciwcia, title = Ciwcia, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ciwcia} }

S.FORM: Ciwcia Itiniay i Guanshan Cen no Taitung ko Ciwcia a niyaro', 159 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 443 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 29% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 130 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 71% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 313 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 14%, Tayal 2%, Paiwan 1%, Bunun 9%, Truku 1%, roma 2%.

Ciwcia Itiniay i Goanshan Cen no Taitong ko Ciwcia a niyaro', 159 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 443 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 29% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 130 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 71% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 313 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 14%, Tayal 2%, Paiwan 1%, Bonon 9%, Troko 1%, roma 2%.
